sqlList.sql: select tlu.id AS USERID, tlu.login_mobile AS TELPHONE, tlu.DEVICETOKEN, tlu.version, tlu.regchanel_code, tlu.platform_code, tlu.CLIENT_CODE from t_lm_user tlu where tlu.platform_code='IOS' and tlu.version >= '3.2' and tlu.THIRD_PARTY_ID IS NULL and (tlu.regchanel_code is null or tlu.regchanel_code <> 'QUNAR')

select tlu.id AS USERID, ult.login_mobile AS TELPHONE, tlu.DEVICETOKEN, tlu.version, tlu.regchanel_code, tlu.platform_code, tlu.CLIENT_CODE from t_lm_usergroup up inner join t_lm_ugroup_ult ult on up.id = ult.usergroup_id inner join t_lm_user tlu on tlu.id = ult.login_mobile AND tlu.platform_code='IOS' and tlu.version >= '3.2' and tlu.THIRD_PARTY_ID IS NULL and (tlu.regchanel_code is null or tlu.regchanel_code <> 'QUNAR') inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:UserGroupList, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:UserGroupList) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:UserGroupList, ',', ''))) dt on up.id=dt.commlist
delete from freek_t_1 t where t.col4=:TaskID
select tlu.login_mobile AS TELPHONE, tlu.DEVICETOKEN from freek_t_1 ft inner join t_lm_user tlu on tlu.login_mobile = ft.col2 AND tlu.devicetoken IS NOT NULL where ft.col4=:TaskID

select tlu.id AS USERID , tlu.login_mobile AS TELPHONE, tlu.DEVICETOKEN, tlu.version, tlu.regchanel_code, tlu.platform_code, tlu.CLIENT_CODE from freek_t_1 ft inner join t_lm_user tlu on tlu.id = ft.col2 where ft.col4=:TaskID
